A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Been a fan since 1977.   I've seen every SW episode at least 3 times in the theaters\, some as many as over a dozen.  I own every episode - prequels and Rogue One included on Blu Ray.  I have NO desire to see this piece of trash again in any setting.

I will not be buying my kids toys from this movie or the next if it is as bad as this one.  This movie went so off the rails I don't know how JJ Abrams will be able to fix it in the next one.
I was looking forward to the next generation of of characters fromthe Force Awakens.  But they went no where in this movie and instead we got a movie full of porgs and other bad new characters that can't act.  No thanks.
